price: (Abo ni) ba bandi bizera ko bazahura na Nyagasani wabo, kandi ko bazasubira iwe (ku munsi w’imperuka).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaẓunnūna annahum mulāqū rabbihim wa-annahum ilayhi rājiʿūna
